in the object for each data row in the control. 當`Edit`按鈕的按一下項目時，就會引發事件和`Edit`按鈕取代`Update`和`Cancel`按鈕。When the `Edit` button for an item is clicked, the event is raised and the `Edit` button is row, and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!NOTE] > 您必須提供值， ，和屬性。You must provide values for the , , and properties. 否則，相關聯的按鈕不會出現在。Otherwise, the associated buttons will not appear in the . 中的按鈕可以設定要顯示為超連結或按鈕，藉由設定屬性。The buttons in the can be set to display as hyperlinks or push buttons by setting the property. 按一下`Update`或`Cancel`按鈕引發或事件，分別。Clicking the `Update` or `Cancel` button raises 您可以使用驗證控制項來顯示中的輸入的文字之前驗證使用者輸入控制項。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 根據預設，會執行頁面驗證時`Update`按鈕按一下控制項時。By default, page validation is performed when an `Update` button in the control is clicked. 頁面驗證判斷控制項是否會與驗證相關聯的輸入的控制項在頁面上，所有通過驗證控制項所指定的驗證規則。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 若要避免發生頁面驗證，將屬性`false`。To prevent page validation from occurring, set the property to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將物件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to add an object to a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將驗證頁面上的控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以獨立於其他的驗證群組頁面上進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性，以指定的更新按鈕中的驗證群組名稱回傳至伺服器時，物件會導致驗證。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the Update button in an object causes validation when it posts back to the server. 屬性沒有作用時，才值屬性設定為`true`。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只會驗證指定的群組一部分的控制項的驗證中的更新按鈕回傳至伺服器的物件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the Update button in an object posts back to the server. 如果您未指定的值屬性和屬性設定為`true`，會驗證所有驗證控制項在頁面上，不會指派給驗證群組中的更新按鈕物件回傳至伺服器。If you do not specify a value for the property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the Update button in an object posts back to the server. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state.
